      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this DoaVectorD to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a DoaVectorD object that represents the same amount of displacement as this DoaVectorD.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to compare this DoaVectorD against
        Returns:
        true if the given object represents a DoaVectorD equivalent to this DoaVectorD, false otherwise
